## EditorSuggestTriggerInfo interface


**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface EditorSuggestTriggerInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`end`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/EditorSuggestTriggerInfo/end.md) |  | [`EditorPosition`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/EditorPosition.md) | The end position of the triggering text. This is used to position the popover. |
|  [`query`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/EditorSuggestTriggerInfo/query.md) |  | <code>string</code> | They query string (usually the text between start and end) that will be used to generate the suggestion content. |
|  [`start`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/EditorSuggestTriggerInfo/start.md) |  | [`EditorPosition`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/EditorPosition.md) | The start position of the triggering text. This is used to position the popover. |
